member.name: T:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options
member.summary: This class contains configuration options for a Cloud Foundry system service.

member.name: F:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.index
member.summary: Index of the service node.

member.name: F:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.zInterval
member.summary: Interval at which varz and healtz are updated.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.NodeId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Node Id of the service.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.MigrationNFS
member.summary: Gets or sets the network file system used for migrating provisioned services.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.Uri
member.summary: Gets or sets the NATS message bus uri.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets the node index of the service node.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.ZInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval at which the varz and healthz are updated.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.MaxDBSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum database size for a provisioned service.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.MaxLengthyQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum length for a running query.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.MaxLengthyTX
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum length for a running transaction.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.BaseDir
member.summary: Gets or sets the base directory for the service.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.AvailableStorage
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum available storage for the service.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.LocalDB
member.summary: Gets or sets the local db in which to save the provisioned services.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options.LocalRoute
member.summary: Gets or sets the IP address of a well known server on your network; it is used to choose the right ip address (think of hosts that have multiple nics and IP addresses assigned to them) of the host running the DEA. Default value of null, should work in most cases.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedService.Initialize(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a local database for provisioned services.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedService.Save
member.summary: Saves this instance into the local database.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating whther persistance was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedService.Destroy
member.summary: Removes this instance from the collection of provisioned services and saves the local database.
member.returns: A boolean value indicating whether the persistance was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedService.SaveFile
member.summary: Saves the provisioned services local database file.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedService.Load(System.String)
member.summary: Loads saved provisioned information the specified filename.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the load was successful.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the provisioned service.

member.summary: Gets or sets the user of the provisioned service.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedService.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password for the provisioned service.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedService.Plan
member.summary: Gets or sets the payment plan for the provisioned service.

member.name: P:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedService.QuotaExceeded

member.name: T:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase
member.summary: This is the base class for all Cloud Foundry system services nodes.

member.name: F:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.nodeId
member.summary: The node ID.

member.name: F:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.migrationNfs
member.summary: Migration Network File System.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.Start(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.Options)
member.summary: Starts the node.
member.param: The configuration options for the node.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.Flavor
member.summary: Gets the flavor of this service (only node for .Net)
member.returns: The value "Node"

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.OnConnectNode
member.summary: This is called after the node is connected to NATS.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.AllInstancesList
member.summary: Subclass must overwrite this method to enable check orphan instance feature. Otherwise it will not check orphan instance
member.returns: The return value should be a list of instance names.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.AllBindingsList
member.summary: Subclass must overwrite this method to enable check orphan binding feature. Otherwise it will not check orphan bindings
member.returns: The return value should be a list of binding credentials

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.NodeReady
member.summary: Service Node subclasses can override this method if they depend on some external service in order to operate; for example, MySQL and Postgresql require a connection to the underlying server.
member.returns: True if node is ready.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.VarzDetails
member.summary: Service Node subclasses may want to override this method to provide service specific data beyond what is returned by their "announcement" method.
member.returns: A dictionary containing varz details.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.HealthzDetails
member.summary: Service Node subclasses may want to override this method to provide service specific data
member.returns: A dictionary containing healthz details.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.Provision(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedServicePlanType)
member.summary: Subclasses have to implement this in order to provision services.
member.param: The payment plan for the service.
member.returns: Credentials for the provisioned service.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.Provision(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ProvisionedServicePlanType,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials)
member.summary: Subclasses have to implement this in order to provision services.
member.param: The payment plan for the service.
member.returns: Credentials for the provisioned service.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.Unprovision(System.String,Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials[])
member.summary: Subclasses have to implement this in order to unprovision services.
member.param: The name of the service to unprovision.
Array of bindings for the service that have to be unprovisioned.
member.returns: A boolean specifying whether the unprovision request was successful.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.Bind(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials)
member.summary: Subclasses have to implement this in order to bind a provisioned service to an app.
member.returns: A new set of credentials used for binding.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.Bind(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Subclasses have to implement this in order to bind a provisioned service to an app.
member.returns: A new set of credentials used for binding.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.Unbind(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.ServiceCredentials)
member.summary: Subclasses have to implement this in order to unbind a service from an app.
member.param: The credentials that have to be unprovisioned.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the unbind request was successful.

member.summary: Subclasses have to implement this in order to disable an instance.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the request was successful.

member.summary: Subclasses have to implement this in order to dump an instance.

member.returns: A bool indicating whether the request was successful.

member.summary: Enables the instance.

member.summary: Restores the specified instance id.
member.returns: A bool indicating whether the request was successful.

member.summary: Encodes a successful status of an operation.
member.param: The response message, with the success property set to true.
member.returns: The response message serialized to a Json string.

member.name: M:Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.NodeBase.EncodeFailure(Uhuru.CloudFoundry.ServiceBase.MessageWithSuccessStatus,System.Exception)
member.summary: Encodes an unsuccessful status of an operation.
member.param: The response message, with the success property set to false, and the exception set to the error property.
The inner exception that was raised.
member.returns: The response message serialized to a Json string.
